long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to Pathuku Classic, the thrilling Eulerian puzzle game that will keep you on the edge of your seat! Connect all the dots without crossing a path twice, but watch out for the relentless chaser who will catch you if you're too slow. With 60 exciting levels and more on the way, there's always a new challenge waiting for you. From easy beginnings to nail-biting conclusions, test your skills in this modern, addictive HTML5 adventure. 

Pathuku is safe for all ages and safe for work, offering challenging fun that's sure to keep you hooked. Update: Explore our new Levels of the Day section for fresh challenges daily!
